definition: deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...

sentences.english: Luckily, Yan Lin's father was in physical geography.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧顏林他爹是搞自然地理的。

sentences.english: Luckily met west light, for two people to break.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧碰到西光，爲二人突圍。

sentences.english: Dr Yuan, many people rid hunger.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧有袁博士，使很多人擺脫了飢餓。

sentences.english: "I'm glad I wasn't in it. " one of the patients muttered.
sentences.chinese: “幸虧我沒趕上”，一個傷員唧咕了一句。

sentences.english: Luckily, Park Yeonghun didn't find it, and let Chang have a narrow escape.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧朴永訓沒有及時發現，逃過一劫。

sentences.english: Thanks to his dress of a National Guardsman, he had made his way without difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧他那身國民自衛軍的制服，很順利地就通過了。

sentences.english: But, luckily, he came back again in ten minutes' time, and then we all set out.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧他不到十分鐘就回來了，於是我們一塊兒動身。

sentences.english: It was fortunately hidden from view.
Thanks to his assistance, we got out of the dark cave safely.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧有他幫助，我們才安全地走出漆黑的山洞。

sentences.english: Fortunately the rain stopped before we started.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧在我們動身前雨停了。

sentences.english: Fortunately, both he and that boy were saved by some adults passed-by.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧有幾個大人路過，把他們倆個救起來。

sentences.english: Fortunately we didn't miss the bus.
Luckily, these young women grow up in Baiyang lake.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧這些年輕婦女，白洋淀長大的。

sentences.english: Thanks to the special personnel are audit said, let a person talent loose a tone.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧特殊說人事部正在審覈，讓人人才鬆了一口吻。

sentences.english: Chewbacca nonetheless returned thanks to the prequel trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 不過，幸虧有前傳三部曲，丘巴卡又回來了。

sentences.english: Thanks to Pa and Uncle Johan, Greta got to keep everything.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧有爸爸和約翰叔叔的幫忙，葛麗塔才保住了一切。

definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
hard to say/unpleasant to say/can't be sure
to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)
Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
